    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(String index,
          String type,
          String id,
          long version,
          org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentBuilder builder)
            throws IOException
        Create action. Indicating that an object has been built and is ready to be indexed. The source of the document is held by the XContentBuilder. The document is only indexed if no document with that index/type/id exists.
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        type - the type
        id - the id
        version - the version
        builder - the builder
        Throws:
        IOException

      • index

        void index(String index,
         String type,
         String id,
         long version,
         org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentBuilder builder)
           throws IOException
        Index action. Indicating that an object has been built and is ready to be indexed. The source of the document is held by the XContentBuilder.
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        type - the type
        id - the id
        version - the version
        builder - the XContentBuilder
        Throws:
        IOException

      • delete

        void delete(String index,
          String type,
          String id)
            throws IOException
        Delete action. Indicating that an object should be deleted from the index.
        Parameters:
        index -
        type -
        id -
        Throws:
        IOException
